participant_1.background:
I'm glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer.
I work at a coffee shop to support myself while I pursue my dream of becoming a famous actress.
I love the peace and quiet of the suburbs, and I enjoy the fact that I can walk my dogs in the park without having to worry about traffic.
i am a student.
I like to experiment with different hairstyles and makeup looks on my days off.

participant_2.background:
I live in a large house with a lot of land to keep me busy on the weekends.
I like the weather when it's warm enough to walk on the beach, but not so warm that I get too hot.
I am passionate and determined, even when faced with difficulties.
I am a self-motivated and reliable worker who is looking for a position where I can use my skills and experience to make a positive impact on the company.
I procrastinate on chores because I'd rather spend time with my pets.

content.text: I'm so glad the weather is getting warmer so I can spend more time outside playing soccer. What are your favorite things to do outside?
I love walking on the beach when it's warm enough, but not so warm that I get too hot. Do you like to play any sports?
I love soccer! I play for my college's team, and I'm hoping to go pro after I graduate.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to try playing soccer, but I'm not very coordinated.
You should give it a try! It's a lot of fun, and it's a great way to stay active.
I might just do that! Thanks for the suggestion.
No problem! What do you like to do in your free time?
I love spending time with my pets. I have two dogs and a cat, and they're my best friends.
Aww, that's so cute! I love animals. Do you have any pictures of them?
Oh my gosh, they're so cute! I love them!
It sounds like you have a great life. I'm glad to hear that.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a nice day.
